tooltip.mobile: Double tap on a cell to edit the content. Hold tap on a row to delete it or insert another one.
tooltip.web: Double click on a cell to edit the content. Right click on a row to delete it or insert another one.

subjects.name: Subject Name
subjects.id_tooltip: Subject ID is a shortname of the subject to make it easier to be referenced in Schedules table

schedules.is_practical_tooltip: Some weeks have classes but not practical ones

guides.title: How to import?
guides.csv:
It is recommended to create a **new calendar** before importing the data.
Also, make sure you are actually selecting the new calendar as the **destination** of the import.

[Click here](https://support.google.com/calendar/answer/37118?hl=en#import_to_gcal) for a guide about importing *.csv* files.
guides.ics:
It is recommended to create a **new calendar** before importing the data.
Also, make sure you are actually selecting the new calendar as the **destination** of the import.

[Click here](https://support.google.com/calendar/answer/37118?hl=en#import_to_gcal) for a guide about importing *.ics* files.
